sentences.english: Will China's one-child policy change in 2010?
sentences.chinese: 2010年中国的计生政策将产生厘革吗？

sentences.english: Li Bin, director of the National Population and Family Planning Commission of China attended the closing ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 中国国家人口计生委主任李斌出席闭幕式。

sentences.english: The director of China's national family planning council even suggested that the authorities would waive fines for poor citizens.
sentences.chinese: 中国计生委主任甚至提议当局免除贫困公民的罚款。

sentences.english: Alleged child trafficking involving family-planning officials in Hunan Province stunned the nation on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 周一湖南省计生官员抢婴牟利震惊全国。

sentences.english: The photo shows Li Bin, director of the National Population and Family Planning Commission, attended the opening ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 图为国家人口计生委主任李斌出席开幕式。

sentences.english: We one needs to understand the situation clearly, two need to explore the birth control work the new mentality.
sentences.chinese: 我们一要认清形势，二要探索计生工作的新思路。

sentences.english: Their active and flexible methods of health education were acceptable.
sentences.chinese: 产妇非常乐于接受村计生专干灵活的健康教育方式。
